refreshInterval.title: Refresh Interval (minutes)
refreshInterval.description: How often to poll ENTSO-E for new price data (in minutes). Minimum recommended is 15.

documentType.title: ENTSO-E Document Type
documentType.description: Defines the type of data requested (e.g., day-ahead prices).

in_Domain.title: In-Domain (Bidding Zone)
in_Domain.description: The ENTSO-E area receiving energy (Bidding Zone Code).

out_Domain.title: Out-Domain (Bidding Zone)
out_Domain.description: The ENTSO-E area sending energy (Bidding Zone Code).

apiKey.title: ENTSO-E API Key
apiKey.description: If your ENTSO-E account requires an API key, place it here.

min_rate.title: Minimum Rate
min_rate.description: Fallback for the minimum energy price if data is missing.

max_rate.title: Maximum Rate
max_rate.description: Fallback for the maximum energy price if data is missing.
